author: cnbc.com
title: Alphatec: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
CARLSBAD, Calif. (AP) _ Alphatec Holdings Inc. (ATEC) on Thursday reported a loss of $1.9 million in its first quarter.
The Carlsbad, California-based company said it had a loss of 9 cents per share.
The medical equipment and supplies holding company posted revenue of $21.3 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $3.69. A year ago, they were trading at $2.08.
